texts.DisplayName:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Enable the use of the user name
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Decides if a member can use his/her user name to login or not (Email is still ok).
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Re: Decides if a user can register to be a member
Decides how a user becomes an active member of your organization.
texts.DisplayName:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Notify the admins of new registrations
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Decides if the admins will be notified of the new registrations or not.
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.I: Decides if the Recaptcha is disabled when a user registers for your organization.
Decides if the Recaptcha is disabled when a user logs into your organization.
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.P: Decides if the password contains at least one digit or not.
Decides if the password contains at least one lowe case letter or not.
Decides if the password contains at least one upper case letter or not.
Decides if the password contains at least one symbol or not.
Decides the minimum length of the password.
